f7ae12127852062f3a516351c2cba070 (03:31): Well, I need something
d50e4c9abc8596e9cefa6f40082c8bee (03:31): to be honest, if you dont need proprietary apps like quickbooks or even advanced MS office stuff.

d50e4c9abc8596e9cefa6f40082c8bee (03:32): then linux is right up your alley, i'm not an advocate for linux all around, but in this caes, unless your using something mission critical that's proprietary, linux is the best option for basic stuff like browsing, chat, email, Word processing.
3da35941afbd862cad732140a2b52ac7 (03:34): he should buy a copy of XP
55329f95b0bc8a9f8ce6c2042a7013a9 (03:34): Shadowcat, Are you trolling also here?
30d8bcb3c8c4c2eaedbc7627471f70c9 (03:34): either will work
d50e4c9abc8596e9cefa6f40082c8bee (03:34): if he's running ME the box he's running it on probably couldnt handle it.
d50e4c9abc8596e9cefa6f40082c8bee (03:34): which is why i said.
3da35941afbd862cad732140a2b52ac7 (03:35): eXistenZ: this is a Windows channel, I'm recommending Windows, so HOW is that trolling?
3da35941afbd862cad732140a2b52ac7 (03:35): a box that can run ME can run XP
30d8bcb3c8c4c2eaedbc7627471f70c9 (03:35): does linux have drivers for the microsoft wireless adapter
3da35941afbd862cad732140a2b52ac7 (03:35): whether or not he'll be satisfied with the performance is another thing
3da35941afbd862cad732140a2b52ac7 (03:35): and probably not
3da35941afbd862cad732140a2b52ac7 (03:35): it's probably a winchip
d50e4c9abc8596e9cefa6f40082c8bee (03:35): like i said, i'm not an advocate, and XP runs REALLY WELL on my 1ghz boxes (256 MB RAM)
d50e4c9abc8596e9cefa6f40082c8bee (03:35): Shadowcat: ndiswrapper.
d50e4c9abc8596e9cefa6f40082c8bee (03:35): not native, but works better than native windows in some cases.
5c25b7bfc49ce3ff8821c0ec86afa4b7 (03:35): Neither a Linux nor a Windows recommendation is trolling here - *if* the recommendations are supported with solid reasoning
3da35941afbd862cad732140a2b52ac7 (03:36): heh unix_infidel and I just have a difference of opinion
d50e4c9abc8596e9cefa6f40082c8bee (03:36): Like i said, i qualified my statement and i gave a reason to why, he / you are welcome to use whatever you desire.
